'''''Vinyar Tengwar 23''''' is the twenty-third issue of ''[[Vinyar Tengwar]]'', a journal dedicated to the scholarly study of the invented languages of  [[J.R.R. Tolkien]].
{{VTnav|22|24}}

==Contents==
* Cover: "''Alqalindele''" —  Adam Christensen, trans. Christopher Gilson
* E.L.F. News
* Letters to ''VT''

* "ELFcon II Report" — Patrick H. Wynne
* "''Taniquetil''" — trans. Christopher Gilson
* "Words and Devices: Filling Up the Corners" (column) — Patrick H. Wynne and Carl F. Hostetter
* "Transitions in Translations: Oops!" (column) — Arden R. Smith
